flawed_nl_solution:
To treat his 20 dogs, Mr. Sean charged Khalil 20*$60 = $<<20*60=12000>>12000
Khalil also paid $40*60 = $<<40*60=2400>>2400 to Mr. Sean to treat his cats.
Altogether, Khalil paid Mr. Sean $2400+$12000 = $<<2400+12000=14400>>14400 to treat his pets.
#### 14400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
